web:/ipfs/QmZQg6gn1sUpM8wHzwNvSnihumUCAhxD119MpXeKp8B9s8"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe2e337e6dde9ef6b680e07338c493ebea1b5fd09b43424112868e9cc1706bca7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6df0ddf21ce9f58271bdfaa85cde98b200ef242a05a3f85c2bc10a8294800a92","dweb:/ipfs/QmRK2Y5Yc6BK7tGKkgsgn3aJEQGi5aakeSPZvS65PV8Xp3"]},"src/Flashloan.sol":{"keccak256":"0xecc170f4179bbdbbab86246e90f7bd67aed921f90540e0c0d8a59f2352b0e943","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://00ad26bb57636a0905e8940631e703f2276c4733db40a4a0f12622dd9cd4e00c","dweb:/ipfs/QmVWof8pz1zh9umV1ADCas4wNYCeFikPihPnS6E4J982QJ"]}},"version":1}

params.fee_: The percentage of the loan `amount` that needs to be repaid, in addition to `amount`.
params.supportedTokens_: Token contracts supported for flash lending.

flashFee(address,uint256).details: The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Loan `amount` tokens to `receiver`, and takes it back plus a `flashFee` after the callback.

params.data: A data parameter to be passed on to the `receiver` for any custom use.
params.receiver: The contract receiving the tokens, needs to implement the `onFlashLoan(address user, uint256 amount, uint256 fee, bytes calldata)` interface.

maxFlashLoan(address).details: The amount of currency available to be lent.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

documentation.text:
@param supportedTokens_ Token contracts supported for flash lending.
 @param fee_ The percentage of the loan `amount` that needs to be repaid, in addition to `amount`.
